author: steve
post: A question that has always intrigued me about the Shroud being a painting, is why has no other work by the artist ever surfaced? I mean, what does an artist do all day…and even more so given that this artist was able to paint a perfect photographic negative 100s of years before proof could be established. I wonder how he/she explained that little plus point to their patrons? :).
title: Charles Freeman and the Huffington Post Caption Writer
